title: Locate Your AT&T Account Number for Prepaid & Monthly Accounts

steps.title: Look online.
steps.content: Look online. Go to your AT&T Profile and sign in. Click My linked accounts and your account number will be listed there.

steps.title: Find it on your paper bill.
steps.content: Find it on your paper bill. You'll see your account number printed in the top right corner of your monthly bill next to "Account number." [1] X Research source

steps.title: Call 611 from your AT&T phone.
steps.content: Call 611 from your AT&T phone. If you can't use the AT&T phone, dial 800-901-9878 instead. [2] X Research source
